name: Wakey Wakey (CuteShadow)
description:
Convince yourself to get out of bed because it's just one of those days.

CONTENT WARNING: Depression, strong language.

Credits

This time, Justinn did a solo project.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Instructions

1. Download the correct zip file.

2. Extract the zip file.

3. Find the .exe inside and launch the game!
